lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Shore mentioned half a dozen other potential buyers for Gillette including Sir James Goldsmith, Hanson Trust plc <HAN>, RJR Nabisco Inc <RJR>, American Brands Inc <AMB> and Ralston Purina Co <RAL>.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Several hours before a regularly scheduled board of directors meeting, Gillette disclosed that Perelman requested consent of its board for an offer of at least 40.50 dlrs per share.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said Perelman, in the process of taking Revlon private after acquiring control of the cosmetics company two years ago, probably wants to concentrate on improving Revlon's operations.
